io.micronaut.http.client

Class HttpClientConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.http.client.HttpClientConfiguration
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BraveTracerConfiguration.HttpClientSenderConfiguration, DefaultHttpClientConfiguration, DiscoveryClientConfiguration

    public abstract class HttpClientConfiguration
extends Object
    Configuration for the HttpClient.

    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
